name: ElderAbuseDiagnosesSNOMEDCT
title: Elder Abuse Diagnoses SNOMED CT
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata>

The terms in this value set represent the diagnoses associated with Elder Abuse as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide as well as other uses of these SDOH terms.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT diagnoses that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
